_description: Do Evil and Be Feared, satirical injunctions on the evil life — nine 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
LErne bodyly to lyueþy seruaunt non hyre þou
                    pay…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Kepe hem pore and to þe bendeþen wole þey
                    drede þe bodylye
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 25-7.
